headline: Whatever happens, I will rise
description: A brief psalm of perseverance — faith reborn through repetition. The speaker commits to rising again and again, turning endurance into sacred constancy.
resonantThread: Cycle of Renewal — endurance as resurrection.
whyItMatters: A small declaration that survival itself can be liturgy; belief reborn as repetition.
articleExcerpt:
Whatever happens, I will rise.
Like the postman, life always delivers.
Whether sleet or doom,
happiness or sun,
I will rise,
I will live,
and I do believe.
sourceFragments: Like the postman, life always delivers.
Whether sleet or doom, happiness or sun, I will rise.

associatedMedia.description: Screenshot of poem 'Whatever happens, I will rise' on Wanderer’s Burn, showing the short psalm text.
